    7703           0 :                         iso9660->zisofs.block_offset = file->cur_content->size;
    7704             :                 }
    7705           0 :         } while (s);
    7706             : 
    7707           0 :         return (ARCHIVE_OK);
    7708             : }
    7709             : 
    7710             : static int
    7711           0 : zisofs_finish_entry(struct archive_write *a)
    7712             : {
    7713           0 :         struct iso9660 *iso9660 = a->format_data;
    7714           0 :         struct isofile *file = iso9660->cur_file;
    7715             :         unsigned char buff[16];
    7716             :         size_t s;
    7717             :         int64_t tail;
    7718             : 
    7719             :         /* Direct temp file stream to zisofs temp file stream. */
    7720           0 :         archive_entry_set_size(file->entry, iso9660->zisofs.total_size);
    7721             : 
    7722             :         /*
    7723             :          * Save a file pointer which points the end of current zisofs data.
    7724             :          */
    7725           0 :         tail = wb_offset(a);
    7726             : 
    7727             :         /*
    7728             :          * Make a header.
    7729             :          *
    7730             :          * +-----------------+----------------+-----------------+
    7731             :          * | Header 16 bytes | Block Pointers | Compressed data |
    7732             :          * +-----------------+----------------+-----------------+
    7733             :          * 0                16               +X
    7734             :          * Block Pointers :
    7735             :          *   4 * (((Uncompressed file size + block_size -1) / block_size) + 1)
    7736             :          *
    7737             :          * Write zisofs header.
    7738             :          *    Magic number
    7739             :          * +----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+
    7740             :          * | 37 | E4 | 53 | 96 | C9 | DB | D6 | 07 |
    7741             :          * +----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+
    7742             :          * 0    1    2    3    4    5    6    7    8
    7743             :          *
    7744             :          * +------------------------+------------------+
    7745             :          * | Uncompressed file size | header_size >> 2 |
    7746             :          * +------------------------+------------------+
    7747             :          * 8                       12                 13
    7748             :          *
    7749             :          * +-----------------+----------------+
    7750             :          * | log2 block_size | Reserved(0000) |
    7751             :          * +-----------------+----------------+
    7752             :          * 13               14               16
    7753             :          */

    7755           0 :         set_num_731(buff+8, file->zisofs.uncompressed_size);

    7762             : 
    7763             :         /* Write the header. */
    7764           0 :         if (wb_write_to_temp(a, buff, 16) != ARCHIVE_OK)
    7765           0 :                 return (ARCHIVE_FATAL);
    7766             : 
    7767             :         /*
    7768             :          * Write zisofs Block Pointers.
    7769             :          */

    7773             :             != ARCHIVE_OK)

    7800             : struct zisofs_extract {
    7801             :         int              pz_log2_bs; /* Log2 of block size */

    7803             :         size_t           uncompressed_buffer_size;
    7804             : 
    7805             :         signed int       initialized:1;

    7819             : static ssize_t
    7820           0 : zisofs_extract_init(struct archive_write *a, struct zisofs_extract *zisofs,
    7821             :     const unsigned char *p, size_t bytes)
    7822             : {
    7823           0 :         size_t avail = bytes;
    7824             :         size_t _ceil, xsize;
    7825             : 
    7826             :         /* Allocate block pointers buffer. */
    7827           0 :         _ceil = (size_t)((zisofs->pz_uncompressed_size +
    7828           0 :                 (((int64_t)1) << zisofs->pz_log2_bs) - 1)
    7829           0 :                 >> zisofs->pz_log2_bs);
    7830           0 :         xsize = (_ceil + 1) * 4;
    7831           0 :         if (zisofs->block_pointers == NULL) {
    7832           0 :                 size_t alloc = ((xsize >> 10) + 1) << 10;
    7833           0 :                 zisofs->block_pointers = malloc(alloc);

    7835           0 :                         archive_set_error(&a->archive, ENOMEM,
    7836             :                             "No memory for zisofs decompression");
    7837           0 :                         return (ARCHIVE_FATAL);
    7838             :                 }

    7847             :          */
    7848           0 :         if (!zisofs->header_passed) {
    7849           0 :                 int err = 0;
    7850           0 :                 if (avail < 16) {
    7851           0 :                         archive_set_error(&a->archive,
    7852             :                             ARCHIVE_ERRNO_FILE_FORMAT,
    7853             :                             "Illegal zisofs file body");
    7854           0 :                         return (ARCHIVE_FATAL);
    7855             :                 }

    7867           0 :                         return (ARCHIVE_FATAL);
    7868             :                 }
    7869           0 :                 avail -= 16;

    7876             :          */
